title: Scott Shively Endowed Memorial Scholarship Fund (Distributions)
description: To provide need-based scholarships for students enrolled in the Office of International Education at CU Boulder.  Awards are to be a $1,000 minimum and recipients should be participants in a study abroad program with a social justice theme.
marketingContent:
To provide need-based scholarships for students enrolled in the Office of International Education at CU Boulder. Awards are to be a $1,000 minimum and recipients should be participants in a study abroad program with a social justice theme.

Your gift will be available for immediate use by the Scott Shively Memorial Scholarship Fund.
